data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in San Juan, Puerto Rico, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Juan, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in San Juan, Puerto Rico to the gospel today.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of San Juan, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in San Juan, Puerto Rico to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of San Juan
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of San Juan, San Juan, Puerto Rico.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of San Juan a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 103,554 believers in San Juan, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in San Juan, Puerto Rico find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
